thread.title: Carl Icahn to Invest $150 Million in Super PAC
thread.title_full: Carl Icahn to Invest $150 Million in Super PAC - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: Carl Icahn to Invest $150 Million in Super PAC
text:
Activist investor Carl Icahn said he intends to invest $150 million of his own money in a political action committee, and his first priority will be to push for tax reform to keep companies from leaving the U.S. through corporate tax inversions.
Mr. Icahn made his fortune agitating for his own ideas inside corporate boardrooms but has largely stayed out of the political fray during his five-decade Wall Street career. But he told The... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
